verses.verse: {To the Director of music: Accompanied by stringed instruments. A Psalm. A song.} {A Call to Thanksgiving} d May God show us favor and bless us; may he truly show us his favor. {Lit. he cause his face to shine on us} Interlude
Let your ways be known by all the nations of the earth, along with your deliverance.
Let the people thank you, God. Let all the people thank you.
Let the nations rejoice and sing for joy, because you judge people with fairness and you govern the people of the earth. (Interlude)
Let the people thank you, God; let all the people thank you.
May the earth yield its produce. May God, our God, bless us.
May God truly bless us so that all the peoples {Lit. ends} of the earth will fear him.
